name: Tappy Ball
description:
This is a Game inspired by Flappy Bird, but I made the speed a little bit faster.

Overall, the game turned out to be pretty well but there are problems like sometimes there is not enough speed to escape obstacles.

I personally like the music but colours are looking awful, i don't think i would work on this anymore as all goals i set for this game are complete.

May soon start a new project.

Hope you enjoy this game.
